Description of incident: The lawfirm of Atkinson, Andelson, Loya, Ruud & Romo notified clients of a data breach, when one of their attorney's laptops was stolen that contained personal information of their clients.The personal information on the laptop included names, addresses, telephone numbers,  Social Security numbers, possible financial information, and medical records information. The firm is providing MyIDCare, ID Experts for free for 12 months for those who were affected. They can be reached by calling 1-877-341-4604. Monday through Friday from 6:00 a.m to 6 p.m Pacific Time. More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-57094
